headline: IBM Announces Quantum Milestone
summary: Jerry Chow, IBM Fellow and Director of Quantum Systems at IBM Research, explains the company's latest milestone in its effort to build the world's first fault-tolerant quantum computer. Chow speaks with Caroline Hyde on "Bloomberg Tech."

raw.headline: IBM Announces Quantum Milestone
raw.summary: Jerry Chow, IBM Fellow and Director of Quantum Systems at IBM Research, explains the company's latest milestone in its effort to build the world's first fault-tolerant quantum computer. Chow speaks with Caroline Hyde on "Bloomberg Tech."

headline: Wedbush’s Ives raises stock price target on this ’AI winner’
summary: Investing.com -- Wedbush analyst Dan Ives raised his price target on IBM (NYSE:IBM) shares to $325 from $300, a move driven by increased confidence in the company’s position as a major beneficiary of the AI revolution.

raw.headline: Wedbush’s Ives raises stock price target on this ’AI winner’
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Wedbush analyst Dan Ives raised his price target on IBM (NYSE:IBM) shares to $325 from $300, a move driven by increased confidence in the company’s position as a major beneficiary of the AI revolution.

headline: IBM Gets Price-Target Hike With Eyes On 'Next Phase Of AI Growth'
summary: IBM is primed for its "next phase of AI growth" and can push higher even after rallying to record highs in recent weeks, Wedbush analyst Dan Ives said Friday.  Ives increased his target for IBM stock to 325 from 300 while reiterating an outperform call in a new client note.  Ives pointed to the $6 billion generative AI "book of business" that IBM reported with its first-quarter earnings in late April.
